Description:
20 acres of Privacy in Central Goldfields
If you like to get away from it all, this idyllic parcel of 8.1 ha is made for you. Bordered by State Forest with plenty of privacy the property includes 2 small structures for camping, 2 waterholes, cleared and treed areas ideal for trail bike riding. Located just 5 minutes drive from Historic Talbot town centre.
For more information please contact Jo Millar 0438 081 301 or Angela Flowers 0437 456 908

Description:
Country Getaway on 58 Acres (23.48 Ha)
What an ideal opportunity to purchase this wonderful lifestyle property, perfectly suited to renovate and live in permanently or use as a country escape or weekender.
Located just 15 minutes from Maryborough and Clunes, the land comprising of some 58 acres (23.48 Ha) contains heavy crabhole/basalt with loam/clay soil types and has been sown down to Phalaris. Power, phone and gas hot water is available to the property which is a 1960's 3 bedroom weatherboard house. A 40' x 20' garage/workshop, dam and 2 rainwater tanks further complete this country escape.
Please call Peter Palling on 0429 814 580

Description:
Classic Creswick Cottage
This Victorian era cottage offers a rare opportunity to enter the tightly contested Creswick township with plenty of potential on offer. Desirably located just a 5 minute drive to the centre of town, train station and all that Creswick has to offer.
This single level home consists of 4 bedrooms, well sized lounge and a very functional Kitchen and meals area all leading off a central hallway. Completing the floor plan are a functional laundry and spacious bathroom with the possibility of altering the floor-plan to suit.
The established front gardens will stunningly come to bloom as spring approaches and the covered rear veranda looks over a private rear garden. The front drive offers space for up to 3 cars with the bonus of a rear carport with separate gated access.
Currently leased to long term tenants and with an updated rental appraisal of $280 a week, this property offers a fantastic potential yield for any property portfolio.
Alternatively, it makes for an ideal opportunity for the first home buyer to get their first step on the property ladder just 15 minutes from the Ballarat CBD.
Insights: 112 Clunes Road, Creswick VIC 3363 was last sold in 2018 and 14 other 4 bedroom house in Creswick have recently been sold.

Description:
A True Family Home
Positioned perfectly in a highly sort after part of Creswick, located only 10 minutes to Ballarat, 20 minutes to Daylesford and a short distance from the Creswick primary schools, local shops, bus connection & amenities.
This large family home is designed with family and the entertainer in mind. You are welcomed with a large formal living room with wall to wall carpets and a gas log fire before you step through to a spacious open plan dining room and family room and stunning hostess kitchen with near new stainless steel appliances and gas cooking, dishwasher and a convenient walk in pantry.
The home features a large master bedroom complete with a recently updated ensuite and WIR, with the remaining 4 bedrooms all with built in robes and the flexibility to use one as a home office.
The freshly updated and light-filled main bathroom offers separate bath and shower and a full sized laundry with plenty of storage space makes for seamless family living.
Additionally cooled and heated by a split system this home has a comfortable feel throughout.
The extensively sized rear garden is further enhanced by a large undercover entertaining area with sliding door access from the family room. A double lock up garage with open access to the rear, plus a fantastic 2 bay shed with roller door access with power and concrete floor at the rear of the property.
Insights: 192 Ballarat Road, Creswick VIC 3363 was last sold in 2018 and 1 other 5 bedroom house in Creswick have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculate 2 Bedroom Unit
Perfectly suited to downsizers and investors alike, this fantastic two bedroom unit is located within an uncluttered and sought after complex and just a few minutes' walk from the centre of Creswick and a 15 minute drive to the centre of Ballarat.
Ducted heating plus split system air conditioning keeps you comfortable all year round, while the freshly painted interior ensures there is little to do for many years to come.
The open plan living zones are complimented with two well sized bedrooms offering built in robes, and a functional bathroom with separate toilet and independent laundry completing a very functional floor plan.
The recently renovated kitchen offers a modern three point working station and ample cupboard space overlooking a neat and tidy low maintenance rear courtyard garden to enjoy.
Finished with quality carpet, vinyl flooring and feature tiles, and with low maintenance gardens, this home provides retirees, first home buyers, investors or those looking to downsize a
Connected to natural gas and offering NBN , this property provides a lock up garage and extra car space.
Currently rented for $240 a week, this is an ideal property to add to your investment portfolio with a projected gross return in excess of 5%.

Description:
GLORIOUS LIFESTYLE HOME ON LARGE ALLOTMENT IN PEACEFUL SETTING
Perfectly located in sought after Dunach tucked between Clunes and Talbot is this sensational double brick lifestyle property offering a high standard of living with the benefit of a peaceful and picturesque setting. Well set back the property sits on nearly 4 hectares (approx 10 acres) and affords attractive views and outlooks from a range of vantage points. Inside you will discover a spacious open plan kitchen, meals and living area. The kitchen boasts quality appliances as well as dishwasher. There is a large second living area with a grand bay window looking out over the rear of the property. In addition there is a rumpus room handy for the kids or even as a third living zone. The beautiful master bedroom offers a WIR with LED lighting as well as ensuite. There are three additional bedrooms. The home is automated throughout including remote access control of lighting, heating via two split systems and ceiling fans etc. There is also a cozy wood fire in the main living area. The property is also fully cabled and with NBN. Outside is ample shedding including car porting for 6 cars as well as a DLUG. There is an in ground fenced swimming pool as well as a dam, bore and expansive gardens and under house studio with separate access. A must to inspect.
Insights: 70 The Valley Road, Dunach VIC 3371 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Idyllic Location Overlooking Golf Course
Imagine coming home to the place other's can only holiday at..... The RACV Goldfields Resort offers a limited number of privately owned blocks within the Resort grounds, lining the fairways of the golf course. This is one of the prime blocks along the bottom fairway. At a huge 818m2, it's close enough to walk to the hotel complex for dinner or drinks, but set in a quiet location.
You will see kangaroos grazing in the evenings and have the opportunity to enjoy the Resort facilities such as the tennis courts, golf course, indoor pool and gym.
The RACV Goldfields Resort is only a few minutes' drive from the heart of Creswick, 12 minutes from Ballarat and everything the city life offers, while being around 25 minutes from Daylesford's spa country.
Creswick offers great public transport, childcare, kinders, primary schools, shopping, hospital and medical facilities, walking and cycling tracks, lakes for swimming and fishing, community centre with many groups and classes available.
Build your dream home today (STCA). Contact our agents!
Call our agent today for an inspection.

Description:
Picturesque Setting for Home or Bed & Breakfast
The 1879 miner's cottage is set on approximately 1 acre and is surrounded by an informal garden that boasts a large variety of exotic drought and frost tolerant perennials, shrubs, succulents, palms and trees.
The landscaped garden includes a dam with boardwalk and 2 ponds.
Rated as one of the Top Dry Climate Gardens in Victoria it has hosted 3 'Open Garden' weekends, featured in 2 magazines (Country Style & Gardening Australia) and shown on the ABC's Gardening Australia television program.
The cottage is requiring renovations, however the garage includes a loft for short term living and downstairs are bathroom facilities. The Victorian abode once refurbished would make a wondrous home or an amazing Bed & Breakfast.
There is 30,000 litres of tank water, town water and a bore to the property. The shedding has great car storage, workshop area and its own viewing balcony over the gardens.
Just two minutes to the hub of town, 25 minutes to Daylesford and 15 back to Ballarat and its terrific coffee, restaurants and pampering are readily at hand.
* This information has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Description:
This Long Time Loved Home Could Be Yours
This attractive weatherboard is sure to be just what you've been looking for. It is as low maintenance as it is pretty. The three bedroom abode has great proportions throughout and wondrous natural light as it chases the all day sun. A renovated kitchen is also spacious and leads out to two separate outdoor sitting/covered BBQ areas. The cherished home has beautiful gardens. As for the locale all the facilities of Lindsay Park are 30 seconds away, while a two minute walk will have you in the main street of town to enjoy your favorite coffee and cake, etc. Those seeking an investment will be encouraged by the 0% vacancy rate with Harcourts Creswick and tenants will appreciate the gas central heating during this winter.

Description:
A Forever Home in Historic Smeaton
Live in luxury in this immaculate brick veneer home set on approximately one acres of rural beauty with additional 3/4 acre leasehold available.
An ideal property for growing families, hobby farmers or tradesman requiring plenty of space both inside and out, along with a quick 30-minute commute to central Ballarat and only 20 minutes to Daylesford.
From the moment you enter this breathtaking property you will be enthralled by the wide tiled entrance and hallway which takes you onto the capacious living dining area connected seamlessly by the central kitchen with a walk-in pantry, quality stainless steel appliances (including a 900mm cooker) and ample storage options.
The spectacular design and exceptional floorplan delivers truly luxurious accommodation with four spacious bedrooms including a lavish master offering walk in robes and double door entry ensuite with spa bath, along with a separate study, a contemporary family bathroom, separate toilet and independent laundry completing the picture at the other end of the home.
Generous proportions in every room include a fabulous sun filled rumpus or games room, a versatile media room along with a formal lounge and main living area; you certainly won't be tripping over yourselves here.
Hosting a function outdoors will become a delight with an ideal L' shaped alfresco zone which provides ample room to dine or play, while this peaceful zone along with wide verandas provide room to sit back and take in the beautiful Smeaton surrounds from every direction.
With highlights such as 20 solar panels producing 5kWs, evaporative cooling, split system, a freestanding combustion heater with internal ducted heating, a freestanding double shed, town water and endless storage and just a short stroll to the historic Andersons Mill and the picturesque Smeaton township this lifestyle property has to be seen to be believed.
This unsurpassed luxury will complete your forever dreams; call our agent today for further details.
Insights: 10 Elizabeth Street, Smeaton VIC 3364 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Stop Dreaming & Build!
Situated just a short stroll to the centre of thriving Creswick, this attractive block of land on approx. 1041m2 is the ideal spot for building your dream home (STCA). Surrounded by established homes and with all available services directly passing the front of the property, you would be hard pressed to find a better block on the market today!
With a slightly elevated aspect, you are offered great views over the historic Creswick Township whilst still being able to maintain certain privacy with the positioning of your new home. And don't forget about the $20,000 regional first home buyers which is available to approved purchasers as well.
Creswick offers everything you will need right at your door step. From the supermarket to cosy cafes, and from highly rated Government and Catholic primary schools to handy buses and the V/Line Service to Melbourne, all the bases are covered for you here.
With a short 15 minute drive to the centre of Ballarat, 22 minutes to the spas and restaurants of Beautiful Dayslesford and easy access to Melbourne via the Western Freeway, this block really does stack up as a great opportunity for the astute purchaser.

Description:
Kick A Goal In Creswicks Newest Development
Set on large blocks with stunning views overlooking the Creswick Football oval and bowls club is this amazing opportunity to build your dream home close to everything.
Lot 7 comprises 1195m2, this is sure to demand attention from smart buyers. There is enough room to build a large family home and have space for a shed and for the pets and kids to roam (STCA).
Lot 5 (no. 4 Lionel Street) - SOLD
Lot 7 (no. 8 Lionel Street) - Under Contract
Lot 4 (no. 2 Lionel Street) - SOLD
Lot 6 (no. 6 Lionel Street) - SOLD
Power in a pit, town water, sewer, natural gas, NBN internet and a sealed road frontage has been provided for all lots. Don't miss this rare opportunity to buy in to a growing area!

Description:
20 acre land holding!
On the edge of Creswick, this 20 acre (8ha) land holding includes a dam and fencing and has power and telephone available. Zoned Rural Living – this is a great opportunity to build your dream lifestyle home (STCA). The block has scattered trees and an undulating landscape making this a fantastic lifestyle opportunity.

Description:
Wondrous Lifestyle To Be Had From Dream Block!
This attractive allotment is found in the executive golf course estate Gold Fields Resort. The parcel measures 508m2 and has a great frontage of 19.87 meters. With these proportions your dream home, weekender or investment property can be generous in size. As expected with a young estate all services are to the parcel. The block is just a pitching wedge from two fairways and a difficult 3 iron to the 19th Hole to enjoy the bar, restaurant and picturesque views over the course. On the Ballarat side of town and a quick escape to Melbourne the locale is very convenient. Those wishing to enjoy the comforts and facilities of Creswick will find the hub of town just 3 minutes away.

Description:
Mortgagee in Possession Golf Course Views
This Double storey terrace style townhouse is situated in the Creswick Golf Course Estate overlooking the rolling fairways and greens of this picturesque country Golf Course on the northern fringe of Ballarat and just a couple of minutes from Creswick Township.
The home offers 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, open plan kitchen and living, double doors to rear decking plus lock up single garage.
The property is between the RACV resort and the Sebel resort and would make a great getaway, home or investment
Mortgagee in Possession
Auction Saturday 9th of June at 12.30 PM
Terms 10% deposit balance 30 Days.
Inspect as per advertised open for inspection or by appointment

Description:
COUNTRY COTTAGE WITH PANORAMIC VIEWS
Situated in the rural township of Kingston, just 10 minutes to Daylesford, 15 minutes to “Booktown” Clunes, and 20 minutes to Ballarat. Adjoining and overlooking farmland with panoramic views to the distant hills, this beautifully renovated cottage reflects the owners’ passion to retain the historic features while introducing a stylish decor and modern fittings. Full of character, the cottage has beautifully livable spaces bathed in natural light to provide stylish relaxed living in a peaceful rural setting. The property is perfect as a permanent country residence, weekend retreat, rental investment or holiday getaway.
Inspections by advance appointment only.
• Stylish renovated cottage with amazing views - great sunsets and changing farm landscapes
• Open plan living/dining/kitchen with 2 sets of French doors opening to verandah and wide deck – perfect outdoor living and entertaining. Wood fire and split system heating/cooling
• Smart central kitchen with gas cooktop and electric oven, dishwasher
• 3 bedrooms - large front bedroom opens to east facing verandah, second BR has original brick fireplace. All have top quality NZ wool carpets
• Bathroom with bath/rainshower over, laundry facilities
• Mains power and town water connected, excellent insulation including under floor, NBN connected
• Approx. land size area: 554 sqm
• Adjoins farmland to north and west
Insights: 413 Kingston Road, Kingston VIC 3364 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
40 Acres with Planning Permit to Build
Located just 10 minutes to Daylesford and 25 minutes to Ballarat this outstanding allotment is situated in an exclusive position with a high quality of neighbouring properties. With long views to Mt Kooroocheang and surrounding hills this approx. 40.5-acre block features rich red soils and good quality pasture and a handful of established native trees. Currently agisted to nearby farmer for grazing, this property would be ideal for livestock, suitable for a horse property or make an ultimate country retreat.
-40.5 acres - Current Hepburn Shire Council Planning permit to build
-Close to Swiss Mountain Hotel and Captains Creek Organic Winery
-1 x Dam, Neighbouring properties with bores
-Shelter trees along some of north boundary
-Sealed road access to Midland Highway
Inspections by appointment only, Contact Tom to schedule a suitable time.
Insights: 16 Eastern Hill Road, Blampied VIC 3364 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
COUNTRY TREAT
This beautifully presented brick home has a makeover from its origins in the 1950’s. Only 8 mins to Daylesford and 2 mins to Newlyn this residence is sitting on a large allotment of approx 1.45 acres and boasting 2 road frontages. This property is perfectly suited to a tradesperson looking for storage, someone wanting a hobby farm or a cosy family home. The 3 bedroom, one bathroom home has a recently renovated and modern kitchen.
• 3 bedrooms, 2 with build in robes
• Family bathroom with spa
• Bright, north facing lounge room with gas fire
• Separate laundry, storeroom and sun room
• Large block 1.45 acres with two road frontage
• 3 large form sheds and 2 car carport
• 2 x 22 000 litre water tank plus inground water bore
• Walking distance to the iconic Swiss Mount Hotel
Inspection by private appointment only.
Insights: 31 Daylesford-Clunes Road, Blampied VIC 3364 was last sold in 2018.
